entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 09:28 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.5°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: WSW 58 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
